CustomField.formula: CASE( Status_Old__c , 'Claim Received', 'Active', 'Settlement Negotiations', 'Active', 'Served Process for Lawsuit', 'Active', 'Counsel Engaged', 'Active', 'Dispositive Motion Pending', 'Active', 'Answer Filed', 'Active', 'Case Dismissed', 'Closed', 'Hearing Scheduled', 'Active', 'In Discovery Period', 'Active', 'Awaiting Trial', 'Active', 'Trial Concluded', 'Active', 'In Appeal', 'Active', 'Case Closed', 'Closed', null)
CustomField.label: Active or Closed?
